title: Everyone forgt about baiting
body:
Not "chase me into this bush full of team mates" I'm talking about 
Get close to riven, proceed to watch her e q w you, dodge it, now she has cool downs, kick her ass for being a greedy fuckabitch. ... Bait out moves. Easy way to counter champs. Lol.

replies.body:
I will recall in front of soraka.

Then she will obviously cast Q to hit me

then I will dodge it.

rinse and repeat until Soraka goes oom.

the best example i can think of is {{champion:103}}:

walk forward until she uses E, juke it and then for the next 7-10 seconds go ham

I do dis like.. all da time as Nasus ;l
free farm top all day erry day

Nasus is like, the most potent bait in the game
any action you do easily invokes immediate aggression

"dodge it" as if anyone can dodge a Riven E W unless they have insane reflexes and a mobility ability. Don't bother mentioning that even if her W misses, she still gets the passive AD boost for her next AA, plus 3 Qs that has a knockup at the end and insanely low cooldowns.

You picked like one of the worst possible examples to prove your point.

Darius Q/E or Jax E would have been far better options for you to use.
